title: Recent trends in incorporation of CO2 into organosulfur compounds via C–S bond cleavage
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15680-15690
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02405B, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rahadian Zainul, Media Noori Abdullah, Shakir Mahmood Saeed, Ameer Hassan Idan, Nahed Mahmood Ahmed Alsultany, Sattar Arshadi, Farnaz Behmagham, Esmail Vessally
Desulfurative functionalization of organosulfur compounds to form various carbon–carbon and carbon–heteroatom bonds has become established as a powerful tool in organic chemistry.
